feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts

entry.title: The most disturbing curses are inflicted on those who were once blessed

link.title: The most disturbing curses are inflicted on those who were once blessed

entry.content:
Post 202727 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This author is a right winger who is writing on substack about Nazi-adjacent things. Maybe this could be part of a larger post but as a post on its own it's not the right post for MeFi in this current climate. -- jessamyn
entry.summary: Post 202727 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This author is a right winger who is writing on substack about Nazi-adjacent things. Maybe this could be part of a larger post but as a post on its own it's not the right post for MeFi in this current climate. -- jessamyn

entry.title: The best RTO policy? Make the office more like working from home

link.title: The best RTO policy? Make the office more like working from home

entry.content:
Post 202598 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: OP has posted about this company over half a dozen times, at least. Temp banning for now, so that admin can have a look at if this is marketing / promotional posting, which is against guidelines and a permanently bannable offense. -- taz
